title: Healthier cottage pie
ingredients: ['3 large potatoes, peeled and diced', '1/2 head cauliflower, cut into florets', '1 splash olive oil', '1 onion, diced', '400g lean minced beef', '1/2 punnet mushrooms, diced', '2 medium leeks, thinly sliced', '500ml of beef stock', 'salt and pepper, to taste', 'beef or onion gravy granules, to thicken', 'chopped fresh parsley, to taste', '10g margarine', '1 splash milk', '40g Cheddar cheese, grated']
